dmca.title: Notice of Claimed Infringement
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: sales@inetguides [mailto:sales@inetguides.com] 
Sent: Saturday, January 06, 2007 11:59 PM
To: Copyright
Subject: Notice of Claimed Infringement


Subject:      Notice of Claimed Infringement 

Date:         January 6, 2007

From:         sales@inetguides.com

To:           copyright@theplanet.com 

 

 

To whom it may concern:

 

Your company hosts a domain name located at http://duploclique.com
<http://duploclique.com/>  which in turn hosts the site
http://www.wowguidesreviews.com/wow-guides-reviews/index.html
<http://www.wowguidesreviews.com/wow-guides-reviews/index.html> .  The
above mentioned site
http://www.wowguidesreviews.com/wow-guides-reviews/index.html
<http://www.wowguidesreviews.com/wow-guides-reviews/index.html>
contains direct reproduction of copyrighted images and or text located
on our website. This product, its graphics and or content is copyrighted
to and owned by me as the creator of WoW Guide Reviews located at
http://www.wowguidereviews.com <http://www.wowguidereviews.com/> . 

 

The stated registrant of both sites in question is Joao Cesar. Mr. Cesar
owns the hosting site http://duploclique.com <http://duploclique.com/>
which provides server support for
http://www.wowguidesreviews.com/wow-guides-reviews/index.html
<http://www.wowguidesreviews.com/wow-guides-reviews/index.html> . 

 

The graphics, content and product that are in violation on their site
(which are owned by me) can be found on my site and is specifically
indicated as copyrighted to me at http://www.wowguidereviews.com
<http://www.wowguidereviews.com/> ; this individual has directly copied
our website without our permission.

 

The use of this material on the web page hosted at your site is illegal
under copyright law and forbidden under my terms of use.

 

I Kimberly Hammond, in good faith, report that the use of these links by
the website in question is a violation of copyright laws and the
intellectual copyright owner (me). I have not given this individual any
rights to use this link or product for distribution.  

 

I also make the following statement of ownership indicating that the
information provided by me, Kimberly Hammond, is accurate and *under
penalty of perjury* I am the copyright and/or intellectual property
rights owner of the material in question. I am legally authorized and
represent myself, as I am the licensed owner of the copyrighted
material.

 

Please remedy this offense with either:

 

(1) Your immediate contact with the site owner demanding the prompt
removal of the link to the product owned by and copyrighted to me or (2)
that you remove the site itself and/or the link to the product from your
server.

 

Your expeditious attention to this matter is greatly appreciated as I
find no other recourse for remedy without undertaking legal action.

 

Please understand that this letter is not a warning or threat. It is
being sent to you as part of a legal process that must be followed in an
effort to maintain my legal rights. You can put an immediate stop to
this process by acting in accordance with this offer of good faith.

 

I Kimberly Hammond make the following statement *under penalty of
perjury*, that the above information and statements are accurate and
true.

 

Sincerely, 

 

/Kimberly Hammond/

Kimberly Hammond

3765 W. 171st Street

Torrance, CA 90504

310-324-7794

Reply to: sales@inetguides.com

Advanced Runescape

http://www.wowguidereviews.com <http://www.wowguidereviews.com/>
